00012 #ifndef IF_BASE_H_
00013 #define IF_BASE_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Abstract base class for event generator interface classes. The base class   *
00017  * contains the abstract fill()/write()/reset() methods, plus some common data *
00018  * members such as the number of streamed events.                              *
00019  *                                                                             *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 #include <cstdlib>
00023 #include <vector>
00024 #include <Camgen/ps_gen_base.h>
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00029 
00030     template<class model_t>class interface_base
00031     {
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035             /*-------------------*/
00036 
00037             typedef ps_generator_base<model_t> generator_type;
00038             typedef typename generator_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00039             typedef typename generator_type::value_type value_type;
00040             typedef typename generator_type::size_type size_type;
00041 
00042             struct stats_entry
00043             {
00044                 size_type input_evts;
00045                 size_type output_evts;
00046                 MC_integral<value_type>xsec;
00047 
00048                 stats_entry():input_evts(0),output_evts(0){}
00049             };
00050 
00051             /* Constructors/destructors: */
00052             /*---------------------------*/
00053 
00055 
00056             interface_base(generator_type* gen_):gen(gen_),input_evts(0),output_evts(0),zero_weight_flag(false){}
00057 
00059 
00060             virtual ~interface_base(){}
00061 
00062             /* Public modifiers: */
00063             /*-------------------*/
00064 
00066 
00067             virtual bool fill()
00068             {
00069                 proc_id=gen->process_id();
00070                 ++input_evts;
00071                 stats_entry& stats=proc_stats[proc_id];
00072                 ++(stats.input_evts);
00073                 stats.xsec=gen->sub_xsec();
00074                 w=gen->w();
00075                 if(w<(value_type)0)
00076                 {
00077                     return false;
00078                 }
00079                 if(w==(value_type)0 and !zero_weight_flag)
00080                 {
00081                     return false;
00082                 }
00083                 if(fill_event())
00084                 {
00085                     ++output_evts;
00086                     ++stats.output_evts;
00087                     return true;
00088                 }
00089                 return false;
00090             }
00091 
00093 
00094             virtual bool write()=0;
00095 
00097 
00098             virtual void write_zero_weight_events()
00099             {
00100                 zero_weight_flag=false;
00101             }
00102 
00104 
00105             virtual void skip_zero_weight_events()
00106             {
00107                 zero_weight_flag=false;
00108             }
00109 
00110             /* Public readout methods: */
00111             /*-------------------------*/
00112 
00114 
00115             size_type processes() const
00116             {
00117                 return (gen==NULL)?0:(gen->processes());
00118             }
00119 
00121 
00122             virtual size_type event_size() const=0;
00123 
00125 
00126             size_type input_events() const
00127             {
00128                 return input_evts;
00129             }
00130 
00132 
00133             size_type input_events(int i) const
00134             {
00135                 typename std::map<int,stats_entry>::const_iterator it=proc_stats.find(i);
00136                 return (it==proc_stats.end())?0:(it->second.input_evts);
00137             }
00138 
00140 
00141             size_type output_events() const
00142             {
00143                 return output_evts;
00144             }
00145 
00147 
00148             size_type output_events(int i) const
00149             {
00150                 typename std::map<int,stats_entry>::const_iterator it=proc_stats.find(i);
00151                 return (it==proc_stats.end())?0:(it->second.output_evts);
00152             }
00153 
00155             
00156             size_type file_size() const
00157             {
00158                 return output_evts*event_size();
00159             }
00160 
00162 
00163             bool writes_zero_weights() const
00164             {
00165                 return zero_weight_flag;
00166             }
00167 
00170 
00171             std::ostream& print_statistics(std::ostream& os) const
00172             {
00173                 for(typename std::map<int,stats_entry>::const_iterator it=proc_stats.begin();it!=proc_stats.end();++it)
00174                 {
00175                     os<<std::setw(20)<<std::left<<it->first;
00176                     os<<std::setw(20)<<std::left<<it->second.input_evts;
00177                     os<<std::setw(20)<<std::left<<it->second.xsec.value;
00178                     os<<std::setw(20)<<std::left<<it->second.xsec.error<<std::endl;
00179                 }
00180                 return os;
00181             }
00182 
00183         protected:
00184 
00185             /* Generator instance: */
00186 
00187             generator_type* gen;
00188 
00189             /* Event weight: */
00190 
00191             value_type w;
00192 
00193             /* Subprocess id: */
00194 
00195             int proc_id;
00196 
00197             /* Abstract method filling the event variables: */
00198 
00199             virtual bool fill_event()=0;
00200 
00201         private:
00202 
00203             /* Number of events streamed to the interface. */
00204 
00205             size_type input_evts;
00206 
00207             /* Number of events written to disk. */
00208 
00209             size_type output_evts;
00210 
00211             /* Flag denoting whether events with zero weight are written to tape. */
00212 
00213             bool zero_weight_flag;
00214 
00215             /* Map with process-id keys and stats entries as values. */
00216 
00217             std::map<int,stats_entry> proc_stats;
00218     };
00219 }
00220 
00221 #endif /*IF_BASE_H_*/
